content:
I haven't thought about creating a theme or narrative for my coin collection, but that's a great idea. I think I'll focus on creating a collection that showcases coins from different countries and eras, highlighting their unique designs, historical significance, and cultural context. This will allow me to share a broader story about the world's rich cultural heritage and the art of numismatics.

Regarding behind-the-scenes content, I definitely plan to share some photos and stories about my coin hunting adventures, including my experiences at antique shops, collectibles fairs, and online marketplaces. I'll also share tips and tricks about photographing coins, including my studio setup, lighting techniques, and post-processing methods. This will help others who are interested in coin collecting and photography, and it will also provide a more personal touch to my online presence.

By the way, I've been thinking about creating a YouTube channel where I can share more in-depth videos about my coin collection, photography techniques, and collecting experiences.
